name: Sweet Potato Curry
description: This sweet potato curry with spinach and chickpeas makes the perfect weeknight dinner for the whole family! It's super comforting, healthy, vegan, and it comes together in less than 30 minutes!
recipeIngredient: 2  sweet potatoes, cut into cubes  ((about 17 oz))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the rice according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the sweet potato and cut it into cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the sweet potato and cut it into cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the onion into thin strips. Finely chop the garlic and the ginger.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the onion into thin strips. Finely chop the garlic and the ginger.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes until it's translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat the olive oil in a large pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes until it's translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the sweet potato cubes and cook them for 3 minutes on high heat. Stir frequently.
recipeInstructions.name: Then add the sweet potato cubes and cook them for 3 minutes on high heat. Stir frequently.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the coconut milk, the vegetable broth, the chickpeas, and the salt and cook for 20 minutes on medium heat until the sweet potato cubes are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the coconut milk, the vegetable broth, the chickpeas, and the salt and cook for 20 minutes on medium heat until the sweet potato cubes are tender.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spinach and cook for 1 minute or until wilted. Season with black pepper and lime juice. Serve over freshly cooked rice. Sprinkle with freshly chopped cilantro and red pepper flakes if you like.
